translations: （尤指乐章的）重复；（从地产每年收入中扣除的）年金（reprise 的复数形式）
重奏（乐曲），反复，重演（reprise 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: Robert Downey Jr reprises his role as billionaire industrialist/superhero Tony Stark.
sentences.translation: 亿万身家的企业家也是超级英雄的托尼·斯塔克（小罗伯特·唐尼饰）又回来了。

sentences.sentence: I have forgotten how many its reprises, it seemed to 2 yuan per month; at most not more than 5 yuan.
sentences.translation: 我忘了租金是多少，一个月两块？至多不超过五块。

sentences.sentence: The first segment focuses on the eve of the battle and the sequel reprises the actual battle in which thousands of ships are burnt.
sentences.translation: 上集着重描述战前风云，而续集则展开了实际的战斗场面，成千上万的船只被烧毁。
